response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your highest expectations. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to excellence and innovation. Given its unparalleled value and significance, we believe it is worth $1,200,000 to you. We are offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $999,000. This exclusive offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to quality. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this exceptional acquisition.", "product_price": 999000}
